meanings.sent1: She finalizes her painting by adding the last brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: He always finalizes his homework before dinner.
meanings.sent3: The chef finalizes the dish with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.
meanings.sent4: The puzzle finalizes with the placement of the final piece.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner finalizes the race with a sprint to the finish line.

meanings.definition: To make a decision or agreement official.
meanings.sent1: The judge finalizes the verdict after careful consideration.
meanings.sent2: The company finalizes the contract with a signature.
meanings.sent3: The friends finalizes their plans for the weekend getaway.
meanings.sent4: The teacher finalizes the test scores and announces them to the class.
meanings.sent5: The committee finalizes the rules for the upcoming event.

meanings.definition: To bring something to an end.
meanings.sent1: The sunset finalizes the day, painting the sky in hues of orange.
meanings.sent2: The closing ceremony finalizes the Olympic Games.
meanings.sent3: The magician finalizes his act with a grand finale.
meanings.sent4: The last chapter finalizes the thrilling novel.
meanings.sent5: The final buzzer finalizes the basketball game, declaring the winner.
